name: Rooted in the Stars GGJ
description:
The original Global Game Jam 2023 Version of Rooted in the Stars, complete with crashing when you win!

New versions can be played here: https://shalimman.itch.io/rooted-in-the-stars

Fly your ship throughout the solar system and connect all the barren planets to your home to spread life. 

CONTROLS:

Up Arrow: 

        hold: go forwards

        double-tap: boost forwards (uses more fuel)

Left Arrow: 

        hold: turn left

        double-tap: dodge left

Right Arrow: 

        hold: turn left

        double-tap: dodge left

Down Arrow:

        double-tap: boost back

Left Shift: 

        hold: slow down

Space bar:

        hold for 1 second next to planet: attach root

                This only works if you have a root attached to your ship. If you don't, go over to a life-filled planet and hold space to get one.
